thread.title: Jeremy Clarkson tells how Amazon Prime came 'riding over... - York Press
thread.title_full: Jeremy Clarkson tells how Amazon Prime came 'riding over... - York Press - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: York Press
title: Jeremy Clarkson tells how Amazon Prime came 'riding over... - York Press
text:
Jeremy Clarkson has revealed he thought about doing "nothing at all" after Top Gear, but then Amazon Prime came "riding over the horizon" and a new motoring show began to take shape. Writing for The Sunday Times' Driving supplement, Clarkson described the uncertainty in the days after the BBC announced it would not be renewing his contract as a result of a "fracas".
 York Press.
